pageContent: Background: Prostate cancer is the most common non-skin cancer in men and sexual dysfunction is the most frequently reported long-term side effect of prostate cancer surgery or radiation. The aim of this study was to examine the experiences of men with sexual dysfunction and their partners following prostate cancer treatment.

metaData.source:
Cryoablation as primary treatment for localized prostate cancer followed by penile rehabilitation
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/17320669/
